pull.title: Encryption readme update and minor rpc.cpp fixes
pull.body:
A couple incorrect error messages in rpc.cpp and a chunk of text in doc/README.
Not sure if anyone wants that much text, but whoever pulls can feel free to edit/amend/strip out what you dont want.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Bitcoin (dont fork from here, fork from bitcoin/bitcoin)

events.message: Add specific wallet encryption details to doc/README
